title: Neighborhood bulk shopping coordination
content:
Scenario: Neighborhood bulk shopping coordination
    Given Margaret shops regularly at local stores
    And bulk buying could reduce costs for multiple households
    When the neighborhood_elohim coordinates shopping
    Then Margaret should be connected to shopping cooperatives
    And she could coordinate bulk purchases given her time availability
    And multiple households should split bulk quantities
    And Margaret's organizational labor should be recognized
    And cost savings should benefit all participating households
    And her time availability should serve neighborhood benefit
